participant_1.background:
I like to spend my holidays with my black lab by listening to jazz.
I took George to the park for a picnic and we played fetch.
I had to say goodbye to my mother when she passed away.
I am a proud American who loves to drink coffee and create content for my YouTube channel.
My family members are all very supportive of my dreams.

participant_2.background:
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
My heart breaks when I think about the time my dog died.

content.text: It is indeed. I went for a run this morning.
I wish I had the energy to do that!
It helps me clear my head and get ready for the day.
I know what you mean. I love to listen to jazz in the morning.
That's relaxing. I usually listen to pop music.
I love the Chainsmokers, Billie Eilish, and Dua Lipa.
I like Billie Eilish, but I've never heard of Dua Lipa.
She's really great! You should check her out.
I will! I love discovering new music.
What kind of music do you make on your YouTube channel?
I make music reviews and vlogs.
That sounds really cool! Do you get a lot of views?
Not really, but it's a lot of fun to do.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
